name: Sorrows End
description: When the King of Dicleus is assassinated, the Diclean army razes their neighboring kingdom of Jesagris in retaliation for actions Jesagris never committed, creating many orphans.  Sorrows End follows the story of one said orphan and her quest to find a way to prevent such tragedies from occurring again.  Will she make friends?  Will she save others?  Will there be a talking cat?  Yes to all!  Expect 8-12 hours of gameplay.  Contains fantasy violence, frightening themes and themes of anguish.  Features include character customization, choices that matter, three endings, and partial controller support.
